rationale: GoldenGate requires a license for Oracle GoldenGate to use.
recommended_action: Golden Gate can be uninstalled if you are not using it and do plan to use it: https://docs.oracle.com/goldengate/1212/gg-winux/GIORA/uninstall.htm#GIORA463
error_message: GoldenGate is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle GoldenGate
